titlestmt.titleproper: Register of the Jane Lathrop Stanford miscellaneous papers
titlestmt.author: Finding aid prepared by Hoover Institution Archives Staff

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using the Archivists' Toolkit 2017-08-08T09:51-0700
profiledesc.langusage: Finding aid is written in English

change.item: Revised to add links to digital collections site by Sarah Patton.
Revised to update encoding by Jill Golden.

did.abstract: Photocopy of letter, 1895, relating to the prospects of Stanford University and to a United States government lawsuit against the estate of Leland Stanford; and 3 photograph albums of scenes in Japan, presented to Mrs. Stanford upon her visit in 1902. Digital copies also available online at https://digitalcollections.hoover.org

accessrestrict.head: Access
accessrestrict.p: Collection is open for research. Digital copies also available online at https://digitalcollections.hoover.org

userestrict.head: Publication Rights
userestrict.p: For copyright status, please contact the Hoover Institution Archives.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: [Identification of item], Jane Lathrop Stanford miscellaneous papers, [Box number], Hoover Institution Archives.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: Acquired by the Hoover Institution Archives.

accruals.head: Accruals
accruals.p: Materials may have been added to the collection since this finding aid was prepared. To determine if this has occurred, find the collection in Stanford University's online catalog at http://searchworks.stanford.edu/. Materials have been added to the collection if the number of boxes listed in the online catalog is larger than the number of boxes listed in this finding aid.

altformavail.head: Alternate Forms Available
altformavail.p: Digital copies also available online at https://digitalcollections.hoover.org

bioghist.head: Biographical Note
bioghist.p: Widow of Leland Stanford; co-founder of Stanford University.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content of Collection
scopecontent.p: Photocopy of letter, 1895, relating to the prospects of Stanford University and to a United States government lawsuit against the estate of Leland Stanford; and 3 photograph albums of scenes in Japan, presented to Mrs. Stanford upon her visit in 1902.
